text:
One of the students being taken to hospital in Murud on Monday. — Photo: AFP

“From what we know, 115 students accompanied by 11 teachers and staffers set out from Pune at 6.30 in the morning. 13 bodies have been retrieved so far, of which 10 are those of girls. The body of a male student is yet to be found,” said Mr. Burde.

Mr. Burde said the five girls, who were traumatised by the incident, were undergoing treatment.

“We are numbed by this tragedy. We are making all efforts to help the students and their families with the help of the local villagers and police. We are also in touch with the local politicians in the area and they have agreed to deploy resources immediately for the rescue operations,” said P.A. Inamdar, President, Maharashtra Cosmopolitan Education Society.
title: 13 Pune college students drown
